name: Disaster Clue
description:
'Disaster Clue’ is a mobile application that lets one experience such scenarios, like  being stuck in a burning area or being stranded in flooded areas in an interactive,  enjoyable and informative way. Playing or engaging in simulation games makes learning  more interesting, in addition to reading books, articles, news, magazines and staring at  pictures of survival tips.

This was created for the subject course Thesis Writing.

Created with Christian Joy Relato as Thesis Partner.
